BD_BUY_DESCRIPTION_TRANSAK: Buy with Transak and receive the tokens directly in VeWorld.

BD_MNEMONIC_BACKUP: Store this phrase in a password manager, write it down or memorize it.
BD_MNEMONIC_DISCLAIMER: Never disclose your Secret Recovery Phrase. Anyone with this phrase can take your VeChain cryptos forever.

BD_MNEMONIC_WARMNING: Never share the words and specific order. Anyone who learns them can steal all of your crypto assets.

BD_RESET_APP_01: Resetting your account will log you out and erase all your data stored locally (accounts, wallets, transaction history etc).
BD_RESET_APP_02: Resetting VeWorld will not change your accounts' balances but will require you to re-enter your secret recovery phrase to access them.
BD_RESET_APP_DISCLAIMER: Ensure you have backed up the recovery phrase of all your wallets, as this action is irreversible.

BD_WALLET_TUTORIAL_SLIDE_01: The secret phrase is your only way to access your funds. This will be needed when importing your crypto wallet from or to VeWorld.
BD_WALLET_TUTORIAL_SLIDE_02: If you lose this phrase you will lose access to all the funds available on your wallet. You should never share your secret phrase.
BD_WALLET_TUTORIAL_SLIDE_03: You can write it down and store it somewhere safe, save it in an encrypted password manager or best of all memorize and never write it down.

WALLET_LEDGER_ASK_PERMISSIONS_MESSAGE: We need bluetooth and location permissions to perform bluetooth scanning
WALLET_LEDGER_ENABLE_ADDITION_SETTINGS_S: in order to give you the best user experience, you need to enable some additional settings in your ledger (Contract data and Multi-clause). Please follow the instructions below to proceed
Open the VeChain app on your Ledger
Unlock your Ledger and open the VeChain app. If you don't have it installed, please install it from the Ledger Live app.
Use the buttons on your Ledger to navigate to Settings and press both buttons to enter the menu.
Navigate to Contract data and press both buttons to enable it.
Navigate to Multi-clause and press both buttons to enable it.
WALLET_LEDGER_ERROR_CLAUSES_AND_CONTRACT: Multi-clauses and contract data are needed to sign transactions. Navigate to Settings inside your VeChain app and press both buttons to enable them.
WALLET_LEDGER_ERROR_CLAUSES_DISABLED_DES: Multi-clauses are needed to sign transactions. Navigate to Multi-clauses inside your VeChain app and press both buttons to enable it.
WALLET_LEDGER_ERROR_CONNECTING_DESC: Connecting to the ledger device, please wait
WALLET_LEDGER_ERROR_CONTRACT_DATA_DISABL: Contract data is needed to sign transactions. Navigate to Contract data inside your VeChain app and press both buttons to enable it.

WALLET_LEDGER_ERROR_UNKNOWN_DESC: An unknown error occurred. Please try again
